{"id":931647474,"question_id":2669,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1681184514,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"47 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/931647474/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Substring With Maximum Cost","memory":"44.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maximumCostSubstring(String s, String chars, int[] vals) {\n        int cost = 0;\n        \n        int max = 0;\n        \n        for(char ch : s.toCharArray()){\n            \n            if(cost<0)\n                cost=0;\n            \n            if(chars.contains(ch+\"\"))\n                cost+= vals[chars.indexOf(ch)];\n            else{\n                cost+=(ch-'a'+1);\n            }\n            \n            max =Math.max(max, cost);\n        }\n        \n        return max;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-substring-with-maximum-cost","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
